field.label: Allow Insecure Connection
field.comment: Allows MConnect SOAP API client to connect to NAV server w/o SSL/TLS certificate verification

field.label: Connection Timeout
field.comment: Connection Timeout to NAV server in seconds. If set to 0, default value will be used: 10 seconds
Save credentials before testing!

field.label: Trigger Password
field.comment: Password used when clicking links in NAV to trigger syncs

field.label: Debug All SOAP requests/responses
field.comment: Warning: all SOAP requests/responses will be logged into Magento log file ./var/log/malibu_connect_soap.log

field.label: Log Requests
field.comment: May consume a large amount of disk space.

field.label: Save Request Logs to DB
field.comment: Save logs to Magento database instead of files. File logs still will be shown if no logs found in database (fallback feature)

field.label: Retry NAV Requests On Failure When Exporting Data from NAV
field.comment: Each consequent retry Export request will be delayed by certain amount of seconds that will increase with each attempt. Delay in seconds formula is: 2n, where n = CURRENT_RETRY_ATTEMPT_NUMBER

field.label: Maximum NAV Export Requests Retry Attempts On Failure
field.comment: Maximum Retry Attempts before interrupting NAV Export requests. The more attempts allowed, the longer delay will be between further attempts.

field.label: Error Email Recipient
field.comment: Comma-separated emails

field.label: Error Email Template
field.comment: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.

field.label: Retry Errored Orders Email Template
field.comment: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.

field.label: Schedule (cron syntax)
field.comment: Need help?

field.label: Remove from queue after (days)
field.comment: Number of days to keep historical queue data. Leave empty to disable.

field.label: Mark queue item as errored after (minutes)
field.comment: Amount of time after which a processing queue item will be marked as errored.

field.label: Maximum NAV data pages to process per one queue item run
field.comment: This is needed in order avoid large amount of data processing failures due to staled/gone corn job process after long period of time.

field.label: Ignore Magento Logical Errors
field.comment: Will allow continuation of NAV sync process by changing last sync date even if there were any Magento Logical Exceptions during the sync process

field.label: Enable Custom Import Schedule
field.comment: Allows Customers Import to be executed by specific datetime schedule

field.label: Import Schedule (cron syntax)
field.comment: Need help?

field.label: Custom Scheduled Import on Week Days
Custom Scheduled Import Run Times
field.comment: Can be "every minute", "every hour" or can contain coma separated start times: 9:30 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM. Times are treated as UTC times

field.label: Custom Scheduled Import Minutes Between Runs
field.comment: In minutes. Put 0 to disable delay between runs

field.label: Enable Custom Export Schedule
field.comment: Allows Customers Import to be executed by specific datetime schedule

field.label: Export Schedule (cron syntax)
field.comment: Need help?

field.label: Scheduled Customers Export on Week Days
Scheduled Customers Export Run Times
field.comment: Can be "every minute", "every hour" or can contain coma separated start times: 9:30 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM. Times are treated as UTC times

field.label: Scheduled Customers Export Minutes Between Runs
field.comment: In minutes. Put 0 to disable delay between runs

field.label: Default NAV ID For Magento Guest Customers
field.comment: Leave blank to disable

field.label: Default NAV ID For Magento Newly Registered Customers
field.comment: Leave blank to disable

field.label: Send Password Reset Email to a New Customers Imported from NAV
Password Res Email Template
field.comment: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.

field.label: Enable NAV Reports In Customer Account
Ignore Magento Logical Errors
field.comment: Will allow continuation of NAV sync process by changing last sync date even if there were any Magento Logical Exceptions during the sync process

field.label: Enable Custom Import Schedule
field.comment: Allows Products Import to be executed by specific datetime schedule

field.comment: Need help?

Custom Scheduled Import Run Times
field.comment: Can be "every minute", "every hour" or can contain coma separated start times: 9:30 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM. Times are treated as UTC times

field.label: Custom Scheduled Import Minutes Between Runs
field.comment: In minutes. Put 0 to disable delay between runs

field.label: Default attribute set for new products
Default tax class for new products
Set Product Stock Status to "In Stock" if QTY > "0"
Assign imported products to all websites by default
field.comment: Whether to assign products synced from NAV to all Magento Websites by default ignoring shop assignments on NAV side

field.comment: Will allow continuation of NAV sync process by changing last sync date even if there were any Magento Logical Exceptions during the sync process

field.label: Set Product Stock Status to "In Stock" if QTY > "0"
Export Enabled
field.comment: Export can be enabled/disabled on "add to queue" level - not on cron execution level. Cron job will always run

field.label: Scheduled Orders Export Minutes Between Runs
field.comment: In minutes. Put 0 to disable delay between runs

field.comment: Need help?

Auto Re-export Errored Orders: Batch Size
Auto Re-export Errored Orders: Delay Between Retry Attempts
field.comment: In Seconds

field.label: Auto Re-export Errored Orders: Sync Period
field.comment: In Days. How many days back errored orders must be re-exported

field.label: New Orders Sync Delay
field.comment: In minutes

field.label: Create Invoice When Shipment Is Created
field.comment: Refer to "Invoice" configuration section on this page for invoicing settings.

field.label: Skip Shipment and still Create Invoice for Virtual Orders
Cancel Remaining Order Items For Partial Shipments
field.comment: If set to "Yes" then for any partial shipment remaining not shipped order items will be canceled and order status will changed to Complete.

field.label: Allow Shipment Without Tracking Number
field.comment: When shipment is imported from NAV without tracking number Magento by default will not allow it. When current flag is enabled, shipment without tracking number will still be created.

field.comment: Will allow continuation of NAV sync process by changing last sync date even if there were any Magento Logical Exceptions during the sync process

field.comment: Need help?

field.label: Customer Groups Disallowed for Price Rules
Price TTL
field.comment: Time for storing promotional price in the magento cache

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Note: This functionality will override standard Magento Tier Pricing logic. M-Connect Tier Price Logic works for ALL customer groups by default. M-Connect Tier Pricing logic is based on M-Connect Promotion Prices if available, if not it will load tier pricing from M-Connect Price Rules
